Author: penguin4glte
Name: Auto Retainer Sell List
Description: Configure a list of items to maintain on sale at (lowest market price - 1 gil)
Changelog:
### Added
- Chat log language setting in the settings window
  - Users can now choose between Japanese and English for chat log messages
  - Language selector is located at the top of the settings window
  - Default language is Japanese to maintain backward compatibility
  - All chat messages (item listing, errors, status updates) are now localized

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/penguin4glte/AutoRetainerSellList/compare/1.1.0...1.1.1
